title: • Flower Crosswords for Learners + Teachers
content:
Dear Friends,  
Flower Crosswords are distinguished by their Rules + Clues + Goals:  
\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_ Words in a flower \_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_  
1. are filtered out of a School Dictionary,  
2. are of the same length (3,4,5 or 6-letter long),  
3. go clockwise + CCW, from the tips of the petals toward the flower's heart,  
4. are controlled by a SINGLE letter forming an OUTSTANDING letter wheel,

In this sample, all the 4-letter words end with K, forming a K-wheel (blue in color).

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415025546im_/http:/typophile.com/files/K-flower_6516.jpg)
  
\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_ A flower can be made Cluless if \_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_ 

1. only the vowels (A,E,I,O,U) are given/taken away, or  
2. one or more letter-wheels is given/taken away, or  
3. a list of the CW +/or the CCW words is given.

Out of a single n-petal Flower Crossword, 2n Flower Crosswords can be made simply by CW+CCW rotating it one letter 2n times, thus helping teachers to test classrooms of 2n learners without allowing them to copy from one another.

\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_ Flowers are set with these Goals \_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_  
1. Multiplying ones vocabulary with less effort+time by exploiting their Word-Doubling property:  
\_ If less than half of the clues is answered, the crossword is done.  
2. Building error-free spelling with the help of the error-detecting & correcting letter-wheels.  
\_ Example: BOOK can not be BOKE to go in line with the K-wheel?  
3. Emphasizing narrowly distinguished tones & subsequently  
4. Strengthening Tongue-Twisting with the help of keywords.  
\_ Hold the K-Flower for example & go on twisting+turning+singing a song with the 4-letter K-words.  
5. Developing memory efficiency & intelligence by attacking words from different positions:  
\_ If FISH is attacked 3 times (in F,S+H flowers), won't it be fully digested?  
6. Encouraging communication in English through an integrated approach where grammar skills are not formally taught but naturally assimilated through constant practice of the language.  
7. More to be discovered.  
\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_  
Happy Exploring with Flowers

Mulakan dari ruangan yang hampir dengan nombor sambil menulis ke arah tengah bunga, setiap nombor merupakan permulaan kepada dua patah perkataan:  
Satu mengikut arah jam dan yang satu lagi arah lawan jam.  
Isi setiap kelopak dengan huruf-huruf hingga seluruh bunga dipenuhi.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415025546im_/http:/typophile.com/files/FlowerUmberlla_4398.jpg)
  
\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_ Peraturan + Petunjuk \_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_ 

Perkataan mengikut arah jam dan lawan arah jam yang akan membina sekuntum bunga adalah:-  
1. Perkataan yang berlainan tetapi sering digunakan.  
2. Kesemuanya sama panjang.  
3. Dikawal oleh sesuatu petunjuk untuk membentuk bulatan yang mempunyai huruf yang sama.

\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_ Matlamatnya \_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_

1. Membina lebih banyak perbendaharaan kata yang penting dengan usaha dan masa yang sedikit.  
2. Membina sistem ejaan yang betul dengan bantuan rangakaian huruf yang berfungsi mengesan kesalahan dan membetulkan ejaannya.  
3. Menekankan perbezaan antara perkataan yang hamper sama bunyinya.  
4. Menambah kefasihan lidah dengan bantuan petunjuk.  
5. Meningkatkan kecekapan daya ingatan dan kepandaian melalui penggunaan gambar-gambar.  
6. Menggalakkan penggunaan bahasa Melayu dalam perhubungan.  
7. Memberi kesoronokan kepada semua di dalam dan di luar kelas.  
 \_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_
